text: Kintu sihamtara majata yisakala jnanata majabuta sihamte arau muminasakale tomara prati yi aratirna karaa haiche arau tomara purbe yi aratirna karaa haichila tara prati imana ane. Chalata pratisthakarai, yakata pradanakarai arau allaha o sesa dirasara prati imana posanakarai, sihamtaka atisonakale ami maha puraskara pradana karaima
